name: oval-stone
effect: Held by happiny : Holder evolves into chansey when it levels up during the daytime.
short_effect: Level-up during Day on a Happiny: Holder evolves into Chansey.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.
